channel.title: Building Website on UH Pol Sci
channel.description: Recent content in Building Website on UH Pol Sci

item.title: How to build a professional personal website in 20 minutes?
item.description: This post aims to provide a tutorial on building a professional personal website in a cost-effective way.

item.title: How to upload Rich Content (e.g. videos) to the website?
item.description: Hugo ships with several Built-in Shortcodes for rich content, along with a Privacy Config and a set of Simple Shortcodes that enable static and no-JS versions of various social media embeds.
